CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please verify that all associated Customer Cases are linked to the Bug ID specified in this request. If you answer "Yes," then all known customer cases are linked to the Bug. Otherwise you are expect to have Cases linked to facilitate the request review.
CustomField.label: All Associated Customer Cases Linked

value.fullName: Not Applicable - No Customer Cases Logged
value.label: Not Applicable - No Customer Cases Logged
